sentence.Network_en: He's a hard - bitten old soldier.
He was a hard - bitten, good - tempered, intelligent fellow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的棱角已经磨手, 成为聪明坚忍 、 脾气很好的人了.

sentence.Network_en: His experiences in that country have left him really hard - bitten.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在那个国家的经历使他真正坚强了起来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(62) ... hard-and-fast 不可违逆的 hard-bitten 不易对付的 hard-boil 把煮熟硬.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... glisten 闪烁，闪耀. hard-bitten 不屈的，顽强的 kitten 小猫.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 经过磨练而变得坚强的
PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业八级考试... ... 8.hanker：v. 渴望，渴求 9.hard-bitten：a. （指人）经过磨练而变得坚强的.

list.abs: a hard - bitten opponent ., 一个心狠手辣的对手.
a hard - bitten opponent ., 一个心狠手辣的对手.
he's a hard-bitten old soldier .他是位坚强的老兵。

entry.tran: （常指因经历过很多不幸而）冷酷无情的，铁石心肠的
entry.def: If you describe someone as hard-bitten, you are critical of them because they do not show much emotion or have much sympathy for other people, usually because they have experienced many unpleasant things.

example.tran: 愤世嫉俗、冷酷无情的记者

means.word_mean: 1. tough and callous by virtue of experience
